summary: Three stories set in three times, 1911, 1966 and 2005. Two actors play the two main characters in each story.
cast: Qi Shu|Chen Chang|Fang Mei|Shu-Chen Liao|Mei Di|Shi-Shan Chen|Pei-Hsuan Lee|Yi-Hua Chang|Hung-Yi Hsiao|Hui-ni Hsu|Pei-Te Hsu|Chi Feng Hung|Lawrence Ko|Ling-Tzu Liao|Fu-Han Lyu|Kuo-Chih Shu|Chih-cheng Wang|Wei-liu Wang|Yu-Chun Yu
title: Tiempos de amor, juventud y libertad
